library(data.table)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)
data <- read.csv(file = './basketball_random.csv') %>%
  mutate(Name = paste('First', 'Last')) %>%
  mutate(CMJ = CMJ*2.54)
norms_cmj <- read.csv(file = './norms_basketball.csv')

ggplot(data, mapping = aes(x = CMJ)) +
  geom_density(fill = 'red', alpha = 0.5) +
  geom_vline(xintercept = norms$Jump.Height..cm.[norms$Percentile == '50th']) +
  geom_label(label = '50th', 
             x = norms$Jump.Height..cm.[norms$Percentile == '50th'], 
             y = 1,
             label.padding = unit(0.55, 'lines'),
             label.size = 0.35) +
  theme_classic()

ggplot(data, mapping = aes(x = Agility)) +
  geom_density(fill = 'red', alpha = 0.5) +
  theme_classic()
